mean_en: used to say that two people, groups, or things are too widely separated or different from each other to ever be brought together, made to agree, etc.
sentence: Was the gap between them really as unbridgeable as it seemed?
sentence_trans: 他们之间的裂口真的是像那样不能逾越的吗？
word_etyma: un不 ＋ bridge桥 ＋ able可...的 → unbridgeable不能架桥的；不能逾越的
